attributes.action: bring forward legislation to hold a referendum for all registered electors in both Scotland and England asking the two electorates whether they are in favour of Scottish independence …  and that if, when the votes are counted, there is a majority in either nation that votes in favour of Scottish independence, then this will be sufficient to bring about an amicable and fair end to the legislative union of these two great and ancient nations of Scotland and England.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
